subject: content(about): rewrite About section with non-technical multi-paragraph copy
body:
Replace the single technical paragraph with four plain-language paragraphs
that describe the site from a visitor's perspective. Change the data type
from string to string[] and update the About component to render each
paragraph separately with vertical spacing.
